goal.core.program.expressiongraph

Class DefinitionNode<T extends Expression>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.program.expressiongraph.DefinitionNode<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The node's type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class DefinitionNode<T extends Expression>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<T>
    A node in the ExpressionGraph representing the definition of an Expression.
    If used as an Iterable, it's iterator() will iterate over the expressions that form the definition.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new, empty definition node.

        public void addQuery(QueryNode<T> query)
        Deprecated. 
        Links a query to this definition. Also sets the definition in the given query node to this definition node.

      • isBasicDefinition

        public boolean isBasicDefinition()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns true if the definition stored in this node is basic, i.e. all queries have the same signature as the definition.
        Returns:
        true if the signature of all queries referring to the definition have the same signature.

      • setBasic

        public void setBasic(boolean isBasic)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the isBasic variable.
        Parameters:
        isBasic - The boolean value to which isBasic should be set.
